Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Seven Urban Suites Nantes Centre places you in the heart of Nantes, convenient to La Cite Nantes Event Center and Chateau des Ducs de Bretagne. This 4-star residence is within close proximity of Le Lieu Unique and Hotel Dieu Hospital.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 107 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. 32-inch flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a spa tub and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Take advantage of the residence's 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Nantes? This residence has 592 square feet (55 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Take advantage of the residence's 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a spa tub and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby.
Make yourself at home in one of the 107 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. 32-inch flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

A stay at Seven Urban Suites Nantes Centre places you in the heart of Nantes, convenient to La Cite Nantes Event Center and Chateau des Ducs de Bretagne. This 4-star residence is within close proximity of Le Lieu Unique and Hotel Dieu Hospital.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

La Cite Nantes Event Center - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Le Lieu Unique - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Hotel Dieu Hospital - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Hospital Saint Jacques - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Chateau des Ducs de Bretagne - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
University of Nantes - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Place du Bouffray - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Beaux-Arts Museum - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Jardin des Plantes - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Nantes Cathedral - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Place du Marechal Foch - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Place du Commerce - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Place Royale - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Passage Pommeraye - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Cours Cambronne - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Nantes (QJZ-Nantes SNCF Train Station) - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Nantes (NTE-Nantes - Atlantique) - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi

The preferred airport for Seven Urban Suites Nantes Centre is Nantes (NTE-Nantes - Atlantique).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
